# Genomic Ranges

This package provides container class to represent genomic intervals in Python. Similar to Bioconductor's [GenomicRanges](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/GenomicRanges.html). ***Intervals are inclusive on both ends.***

In this section, we will walkthrough use cases represeting and operating on genomic intervals.

## Installation

Package is published to [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/genomicranges/)

```bash
pip install genomicranges
```
